    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        public void addUser(String username,
                    String allowedHost,
                    String password)
             throws JasDBStorageException
        Description copied from interface: UserAdministration
        Add a new user to the database, this user will be allowed to connected from the specified host or all hosts if the wildcard '*' is used. Any user added to the database by default has read only access.
        Specified by:
        addUser in interface UserAdministration
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the user
        allowedHost - The allowed host, '*' for wildcard
        password - The password of the user
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to create the user due to insufficient permissions

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(String username)
                throws JasDBStorageException
        Description copied from interface: UserAdministration
        Deletes a user from the database, does not revoke grants
        Specified by:
        deleteUser in interface UserAdministration
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the user
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to delete the user due to insufficient permissions

      • grant

        public void grant(String username,
                  String object,
                  AccessMode mode)
           throws JasDBStorageException
        Description copied from interface: UserAdministration
        GrantObject the user access to the specified object with the given access level
        Specified by:
        grant in interface UserAdministration
        Parameters:
        username - The username
        object - The object to grant permissions to
        mode - The mode of allowed access
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to grant, for example with insufficient permissions
